rukus.text: 39|64|Baluna, 'he ajnara! Tomara ki amake allaha chara an'yera ibadata karate nirdesa diccha

39|65|Ara apanara prati o apanara purbabartidera prati abasya'i ohi kara hayeche ye, 'yadi apani sirka karena tabe apanara samasta amala to nisphala habe ebam abasya'i apani habena ksatigrastadera antarbhukta.
39|66|Baram apani allahara'i ibadata karuna ebam krtajnadera antarbhukta hona.

39|67|Ara tara allahake yathocita sam'mana kareni athaca kiyamatera dina samasta yamina thakabe tamra hatera muthite ebam asamanasamuha thakabe bhamja kara abasthaya tamra dana hate [1]. Pabitra o mahana tini, tara yaderake sarika kare tini tadera urdhbe.

39|68|Ara singaya phumka deya habe [1], phale asamanasamuhe yara ache o yamine yara ache tara saba'i behusa haye parabe, yaderake allaha iccha karena tara chara [2]. Tarapara abara singaya phumka deya habe [3], phale tatksanat tara damriye takate thakabe.

39|69|Ara yamina tara prabhura nure udbhasita habe ebam amalanama pesa kara habe. Ara nabiganake o saksiganake upasthita kara habe [1] ebam sakalera madhye n'yaya bicara kara habe ematabasthaya ye, tadera prati yuluma kara habe na.
39|70|Ara pratyekake tara amalera purna pratiphala deya habe ebam tara ya kare se samparke allah sarbadhika abagata.
